question.xref: DES s3, HC r116, HC r274
question.text: When may you use hazard warning lights?

explanation.text: Hazard warning lights may be used to warn other road users when you have broken down and are causing an obstruction, or are on a motorway and want to warn following traffic of a hazard ahead. Don’t use them when being towed or when parking illegally.

answer.text: To park on double yellow lines
